# What

* **C**lean **A**rchitecture **F**or **U**nity

# Requirement

* Unity 2018.1

# Install

```shell
yarn add "umm-projects/cafu_core#^2.0.0"
```

# Usage

* See [Wiki](https://github.com/umm-projects/cafu_core/wiki)
